resources.string: At any time you can export your Approach data, to back up or transfer devices. Save the file somewhere you can always find it later.
We recommend exporting your data regularly, in case of any unexpected circumstances causing you to lose your phone or data.
You last exported your data on %1$s
You haven\'t exported your data before
There was an error exporting your data.
If you\'re having trouble exporting your data, try sending us an email at approach@josephroque.ca for help.
Import your Approach data from a back up file. You can import a back up you created from Approach, or from the legacy app, the 5 Pin Bowling Companion.
This will overwrite any existing data on this device.
You may not be able to recover it later.
There was an error importing your data.
If you\'re having trouble importing your data, try sending us an email at approach@josephroque.ca for help.

You last imported data on %1$s. If you choose to restore your data, you will lose any new data you\'ve recorded since this import, and your data will be restored to before the imported data was applied. Are you sure about this?
